title: Cascada Howling Button Up Shirts
content:
Inspired by vintage western shirts with SPF (UPF 50+) and made from Oeko Tex Standard 100 fabric in Italy, the Cascada Howling Button Up shirts are designed with multi-sport intentions. Ready to throw on over shorts, whether it’s for a ride or a run, summer short-sleeve Howling Shirt keeps you cool and dry in the hottest days.

These slim-fitting shirts have a traight hem on the front and with a longer and rounded cut on the back to offer extra coverage to the lower back while you are pedaling. The front closure with press studs facilitates the opening and closing of the shirt during the activity.

Specs:

  • Certified as Oeko Tex Standard 100
  • UPF 50+
  • Pill-resistant
  • Button-up front closure
  • Longer and rounded back hem for added protection on the back
  • 2 chest pockets
  • 120 gr weight (size M)
  • Slim fit
  • Made in Italy

See more at Cascada.
